response.original_title: Price of Paradise: Surviving Hurricane Ian
response.overview: Price of Paradise: Surviving Hurricane Ian, is a gripping documentary about the deadliest hurricane storm surge since Hurricane Katrina. It features the harrowing story of a couple and their dogs trapped in a house floating in the storm surge on Fort Myers Beach, Florida. With firsthand accounts, the film explores the human experience in the face of catastrophic natural disasters.
response.title: Price of Paradise: Surviving Hurricane Ian
